comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: STOPS BOXING BOUT TO SAVE WOLGAST; Leach Cross Punches Former Champion Into Helplessness When Referee Intervenes. December 18, 1915, Saturday, Page 8, 615 words The ring career of Ad Wolgast, the former lightweight champion, received a severe check last night at the Harlem Sporting Club, when the referee stopped the bout between the Western boxer and Leach Cross at the end of the sixth round. With both eyes closed and blood streaming from an old wound the former title holder staggered to his corner helpless when the gong ended the hostilities in the sixth round. Story about Wolgast: www.ibhof.com/wolgast.htm
